item.title: 苹果已关闭 iOS 18 降级通道
item.guid: 苹果已关闭-iOS-18-降级通道
item.description:
Apple's firmware website ipsw.me shows that Apple has stopped signing iOS 18.6.2, which means that once a device is upgraded to iOS 26, it will not be able to revert to the iOS 18 series. 苹果固件网站 ipsw.me 显示，苹果已停止对 iOS 18.6.2 进行签署验证，这意味着一旦设备升级至 iOS 26，将无法回退至 iOS 18 系列版本。

The so-called 'signing' means that the system needs to pass verification checks by Apple's servers during installation; firmware that fails verification cannot be installed. 所谓「签署」，是指系统在安装过程中需通过苹果服务器的验证检查，未通过验证的固件无法安装。

After signing stops, users will not be able to downgrade to older versions. 停止签署后，用户将无法降级至旧版。

Currently, users can still use iOS 18, but once upgraded to iOS 26, they will not be able to downgrade. 目前，用户仍可继续使用 iOS 18，但一旦升级至 iOS 26，就无法降级。

In addition, Apple has also stopped signing iPadOS 18.6.2 and tvOS 18.6, meaning iPads also cannot revert to older versions. 此外，苹果还停止签署了 iPadOS 18.6.2 和 tvOS 18.6，iPad 同样无法回退至旧版本。

It is reported that Apple has introduced a new 'Liquid Glass' design language in iOS 26 and brought multiple feature updates. 据悉，苹果在 iOS 26 上引入了全新的「Liquid Glass」设计语言，并带来多项功能更新。

Furthermore, Apple also pushed the iOS 26.1 Developer Beta version yesterday. 此外，苹果还在昨天推送了 iOS 26.1 Developer Beta 版本。

item.title: 「拴 Q」，台风前夕腾讯把企鹅拴住了
item.guid: 「拴-Q」，台风前夕腾讯把企鹅拴住了
item.description:
On the afternoon of September 23, the Guangdong region experienced a highly trending 'Shuan Q' incident on the eve of a typhoon. 9 月 23 日下午，广东地区在台风来临前夕出现了颇具网络话题性的「拴 Q」事件。

Tencent published an article titled 'Tie Yourself Down, Everyone Stay Safe!' on its WeChat official account, featuring an image of a penguin being 'tied down' and a caption advising, 'Quickly tie yourself down, otherwise if you fly away, it'll really be Shuan Q very much,' urging users to pay attention to safety. 腾讯方面在微信公众号发布文章《拴好自己，大家注意安全！》，配图为企鹅形象被「拴住」，并配文提示「赶紧把自己绑好，不然飞走了就真的拴 Q very much」，呼吁用户注意安全。

Meteorological departments in many parts of Guangdong had previously issued typhoon yellow warnings, advising residents to reinforce doors and windows, store outdoor items, and avoid going out during strong winds and heavy rain. 广东多地气象部门此前已发布台风黄色预警，建议居民加固门窗、收纳室外物品，并避免在强风暴雨期间外出。

item.title: 上市公司紧急回应「汽车热失控自动弹出电池」视频
item.guid: 上市公司紧急回应「汽车热失控自动弹出电池」视频
item.description:
According to Red Star News, a demonstration video showing 'car batteries automatically ejecting during thermal runaway' has recently gone viral online. 据红星新闻报道，近日，一段展示「汽车电池热失控时自动弹出」的演示视频在网络热传。

The video shows that on September 19, a vehicle with the 'China Collision Repair Technology Center' logo, during a simulated battery thermal runaway scenario, ejected its battery approximately 3-6 meters from the vehicle body, achieving vehicle-battery separation. 视频显示，9 月 19 日，一辆车身贴有「中国碰撞维修技术中心」标识的车辆，在模拟电池热失控场景时，将电池抛出车身约 3-6 米，实现车电分离。

The video information states that this technology was jointly launched by the 'China Collision Repair Technology Center' and Joyson Electronics. 视频信息称，该技术由「中国碰撞维修技术中心」与均胜电子联合推出。

However, the demonstration quickly sparked controversy, with netizens questioning 'keeping survival for oneself and ejecting disaster to others,' even describing it as 'sacrificing others to save oneself.' 然而，该演示迅速引发争议，有网友质疑「把活命留给自己，把灾难弹射给众人」，甚至用「死道友不死贫道」形容。

On September 22, Joyson Electronics responded to the media, stating that there is no form of cooperative development agreement between the company and the 'China Collision Repair Technology Center.' 9 月 22 日，均胜电子向媒体回应称，公司与「中国碰撞维修技术中心」不存在任何形式的合作开发协议。

Public information shows that Ningbo Joyson Electronic Corporation is a global provider of intelligent automotive technology solutions, with businesses covering intelligent cockpits, intelligent connectivity, intelligent driving, new energy management, and automotive safety systems, operating 19 R&D centers and over 50 production bases worldwide. 公开资料显示，宁波均胜电子股份有限公司是一家全球智能汽车科技解决方案提供商，业务涵盖智能座舱、智能网联、智能驾驶、新能源管理及汽车安全系统等领域，在全球设有 19 个研发中心和超过 50 个生产基地。

According to informed sources, the 'China Collision Repair Technology Center' is affiliated with the Matt Group, which was established in 1992 and primarily operates in the automotive aftermarket business, owning brands such as Welion, Bantam, and MAXIMA. 据知情人士透露，「中国碰撞维修技术中心」隶属于麦特集团，该集团成立于 1992 年，主营汽车后市场业务，旗下拥有威力狮（Welion）、奔腾（BANTAM）、MAXIMA 等品牌。

item.title: 英伟达回应与 OpenAI 合作：仍将以所有客户为优先
item.guid: 英伟达回应与-OpenAI-合作：仍将以所有客户为优先
item.description:
According to Bloomberg, Nvidia released a statement yesterday saying that its $100 billion AI infrastructure cooperation intention with OpenAI will not affect supply and support for other customers. 据彭博社报道，英伟达在昨天发布声明称，其与 OpenAI 达成的 1000 亿美元 AI 基础设施合作意向，不会影响对其他客户的供货与支持。

Nvidia emphasized: 'Our investment will not change our focus or affect supply to other customers. We will continue to keep every customer as our highest priority, regardless of any equity relationship.' 英伟达强调：「我们的投资不会改变关注重点或影响对其他客户的供应，我们将继续让每一位客户保持最高优先级，无论是否存在股权关系。」

Earlier that day, Nvidia and OpenAI announced they had signed a letter of intent for cooperation, planning to build data centers equipped with Nvidia chips, with a total power of at least 10 gigawatts, for developing and running AI models. 当天早些时候，英伟达与 OpenAI 宣布已签署合作意向书，计划建设配备英伟达芯片的数据中心，总功率至少达到 10 吉瓦，用于开发和运行人工智能模型。

In recent years, Nvidia chips have become the most sought-after hardware resource in Silicon Valley, with data center operators scrambling to purchase them, driving the company's sales and stock price to continuous highs, with its market value approaching $4.5 trillion. 近年来，英伟达芯片在硅谷成为最抢手的硬件资源，数据中心运营商争相采购，推动公司销售额与股价持续飙升，市值已接近 4.5 万亿美元。

Despite this, Nvidia's revenue remains highly dependent on a few large clients such as Microsoft, Meta, Amazon, and Alphabet, which are accelerating their in-house development or deployment of alternative components to reduce their reliance on Nvidia. 尽管如此，英伟达的营收仍高度依赖微软、Meta、亚马逊和 Alphabet 等少数大型客户，这些公司正加速自研或部署替代组件，以降低对英伟达的依赖。

item.title: 20 周年 iPhone 或将搭载更亮的屏幕
item.guid: 20-周年-iPhone-或将搭载更亮的屏幕
item.description:
According to MacRumors, industry sources reveal that Apple plans to introduce a new OLED technology called COE (Color Filter on Encapsulation), supplied by Samsung, in its 20th-anniversary iPhone to achieve higher brightness and a thinner body design. 据 MacRumors，有产业链人士透露，苹果计划在 20 周年纪念版 iPhone 上引入由三星供应的全新 OLED 技术 COE（Color Filter on Encapsulation），以实现更高亮度和更纤薄的机身设计。

Traditionally, OLED panels add a polarizer layer above the display layer to reduce reflections and enhance contrast, but this structure absorbs some self-emitted light, reducing brightness and energy efficiency. 据悉，传统 OLED 面板在显示层上方会增加一层偏光片，用于减少反射、提升对比度，但该结构会吸收部分自发光，降低亮度与能效。

COE technology directly covers the encapsulation protection layer with a color filter layer, eliminating the polarizer, thereby reducing the display stack thickness and allowing more light to pass through, increasing brightness without increasing power consumption. COE 技术则直接将彩色滤光层覆盖在封装保护层上，取消偏光片，从而减少显示堆叠厚度，让更多光线透出，在不增加功耗的情况下提升亮度。

Industry analysis indicates that after removing the polarizer, screen reflection and glare control outdoors will be more challenging. Apple is expected to adopt advanced coatings and pixel-level material optimization for visual effects. 业内分析指出，去除偏光片后，屏幕在户外的反射与眩光控制将更具挑战，苹果预计会采用先进镀膜与像素级材料优化可视效果。

There are also reports that Apple is considering a new design for the 20th-anniversary edition, featuring a four-sided curved, bezel-less appearance, and plans to launch its first foldable iPhone in 2026. 另有消息称，苹果正考虑为 20 周年纪念版打造四边曲面、无边框的全新外观设计，并在 2026 年率先推出首款可折叠 iPhone。

item.title: OpenAI、甲骨文与软银宣布在美国新建五大 AI 数据中心
item.guid: OpenAI、甲骨文与软银宣布在美国新建五大-AI-数据中心
item.description:
Early this morning, OpenAI announced in a press release on its official website that OpenAI, Oracle, and SoftBank will collaborate to build five new AI data center sites in the United States, further expanding the "Stargate" infrastructure platform. 今天凌晨，OpenAI 在官网发布新闻稿，称 OpenAI、甲骨文与软银将联合，在美国新建五个 AI 数据中心站点，进一步扩展「星际之门（Stargate）」基础设施平台。

With the addition of these new sites, Stargate's planned total capacity has approached 7 gigawatts, with related investments exceeding $400 billion, expected to achieve the initially proposed target of 500 billion USD and 10 gigawatts by the end of 2025. 随着这些新站点的加入，Stargate 的规划总容量已接近 7 吉瓦，相关投资规模超过 4000 亿美元，预计将在 2025 年底前实现最初提出的 5000 亿美元、10 吉瓦目标。

According to official information, the five new sites announced are located in Shackelford County, Texas; Doña Ana County, New Mexico; a location in the Midwest (not yet announced); Lordstown, Ohio; and Milam County, Texas. 根据官方信息，此次公布的五个新站点分布在德克萨斯州 Shackelford 县、新墨西哥州 Doña Ana 县、中西部某地（尚未公布）、俄亥俄州 Lordstown，以及德克萨斯州 Milam 县。

Among them, some sites are led by Oracle, while two other sites are being developed with the participation of SoftBank and its subsidiary SB Energy. 其中，部分站点由甲骨文主导建设，另有两个站点由软银及其旗下 SB Energy 参与开发。

Sam Altman, CEO of OpenAI, stated: "The potential of AI can only be realized if there is sufficient computing power to support it. Stargate is laying the foundation for this goal and driving the next phase of breakthroughs." OpenAI 首席执行官 Sam Altman 表示：「AI 的潜力能否实现，取决于是否具备足够的算力支撑。星际之门正在为这一目标奠定基础，并推动下一阶段的突破。」

Clay Magouyrk, CEO of Oracle, said: "We are expanding OCI's footprint at an unprecedented pace to meet the rapidly growing demand for AI training and inference." 甲骨文首席执行官 Clay Magouyrk 称：「我们正在以前所未有的速度扩展 OCI 的布局，以满足快速增长的 AI 训练与推理需求。」

Masayoshi Son, Chairman and CEO of SoftBank Group, pointed out: "Stargate is combining SoftBank's data center design and energy advantages to provide scalable computing power for the future of AI." 软银集团董事长兼首席执行官孙正义则指出：「Stargate 正在结合软银的数据中心设计与能源优势，为 AI 的未来提供可扩展的算力。」

Since its launch in January this year, the Stargate plan has attracted over 30 states and more than 300 proposals to participate in the competition. The five sites announced this time are the first batch of selected projects, and more locations will join the overall investment plan later. 据悉，Stargate 计划自今年 1 月启动以来，已吸引超过 30 个州、300 余份提案参与竞争。此次公布的五个站点为首批入选项目，后续仍将有更多地点加入整体投资计划。

item.title: 全国餐饮商家可免费入驻高德
item.guid: 全国餐饮商家可免费入驻高德
item.description:
Amap announced yesterday that catering businesses nationwide can now join the platform for free and enjoy a one-year waiver of the annual membership fee. 高德昨天宣布，现在全国餐饮商家可免费入驻平台，并享受为期一年的入驻年费全免政策。

The official statement indicates that this initiative aims to help the catering industry "attract more customers and operate well," and simultaneously introduces several supporting services such as traffic support, dedicated customer service, and smart cashier systems. 官方表示，此次举措旨在帮助餐饮行业「多来客、好经营」，并同步推出流量扶持、专属客服、智能收银等多项配套服务。

Amap stated that it will continue to listen to merchant feedback, optimize platform functions and service experience, and assist catering businesses in improving operational efficiency and customer satisfaction. 高德方面指出，未来将持续倾听商家反馈，优化平台功能与服务体验，助力餐饮商家提升运营效率与顾客满意度。

Merchants can learn more and quickly complete the registration process by searching for "free entry" on the Amap APP or by calling 400-9039-658. 商家可通过高德地图 APP 搜索「免费入驻」或拨打 400-9039-658 了解详情并快速办理入驻手续。

item.title: OpenAI 在印尼推出 ChatGPT Go
item.guid: OpenAI-在印尼推出-ChatGPT-Go
item.description:
TechCrunch reports that after launching in India, OpenAI has expanded its mass-market ChatGPT Go subscription plan to the Indonesian market. TechCrunch 报道，继在印度上线后，OpenAI 将其面向大众的 ChatGPT Go 订阅计划扩展至印度尼西亚市场。

The plan is priced at 75,000 Indonesian Rupiah/month (approximately 32 RMB), positioned between the free version and the 140 RMB/month ChatGPT Plus. 该计划定价为 75,000 印尼盾/月（约 32 元人民币），定位介于免费版与每月 140 元的 ChatGPT Plus 之间。

According to the introduction, ChatGPT Go users can get 10 times more usage allowance than the free version for sending questions or prompts, generating images, and uploading files. 据介绍，ChatGPT Go 用户可获得比免费版高 10 倍的使用额度，用于发送提问或提示、生成图片以及上传文件。

At the same time, the plan supports better memory of past conversations, thereby providing more personalized responses during long-term use. 同时，该计划支持更好地记忆过往对话，从而在长期使用中提供更具个性化的回应。

Nick Turley, OpenAI's ChatGPT Product Lead, stated that since the plan's launch in India, the number of paying users has more than doubled. OpenAI ChatGPT 产品负责人 Nick Turley 表示，自印度推出该计划以来，付费用户数量已超过两倍增长。

This expansion also positions OpenAI directly against Google in the Indonesian market. 此次扩展也使 OpenAI 在印尼市场直接对标 Google。

Earlier this month, Google launched its similarly priced AI Plus subscription service, offering the Gemini 2.5 Pro chatbot, as well as image and video creation tools like Flow, Whisk, and Veo 3 Fast. 本月早些时候，Google 推出了价格相近的 AI Plus 订阅服务，提供 Gemini 2.5 Pro 聊天机器人，以及 Flow、Whisk、Veo 3 Fast 等图像与视频创作工具。

item.title: 雷军谈年度演讲推迟至本月：内容太多
item.guid: 雷军谈年度演讲推迟至本月：内容太多
item.description:
Before the start of this year's 6th annual speech, Lei Jun posted a short video on Weibo, responding to several questions of public concern. 在今年第 6 次年度演讲开始前，雷军在微博发布短视频，回应了外界关心的多个问题。

He stated that the world is changing rapidly, and Xiaomi is also changing rapidly. "Holding an annual speech once a year is like doing an annual summary, which is quite interesting." 他表示，世界变化很快，小米也在快速变化，「每年办一次年度演讲，就像做一次年度总结，挺有趣的」。

Regarding the reason for this year's speech being later than previous years, Lei Jun revealed that it was originally planned to be held in June, synchronized with the Xiaomi YU7 launch event. However, due to too much content and excessive duration of the launch event, it was temporarily postponed to September, to be released alongside the Xiaomi 17 series annual flagship. 对于今年演讲比往年晚的原因，雷军透露，原计划是 6 月与小米 YU7 发布会同步举行，但由于发布会内容过多、时长过长，临时推迟到 9 月，与小米 17 系列年度旗舰一同发布。

When asked why so many people are willing to listen to his speech, Lei Jun frankly said, "Actually, I don't know myself," and thanked all his friends for their support, inviting everyone to leave comments and share their reasons. 谈及为何有如此多观众愿意听他的演讲，雷军坦言「其实我自己也不知道」，并感谢所有朋友的捧场，欢迎大家在评论区留言分享原因。

It is reported that the theme of Lei Jun's annual speech this year is "Change". 据悉，今年雷军年度演讲的主题为「改变」。

In the video, Lei Jun believes that human destiny is not predetermined. "Whether others think you can or cannot is not important; the key is whether you have the courage and determination to give it a try." He emphasized that as long as one keeps trying, working hard, and growing, there is a chance to "change one's fate against all odds." 视频中，雷军认为人的命运并非命中注定，「别人觉得你行不行不重要，关键是你自己有没有勇气、有没有决心去试一试」。他强调，只要不断尝试、努力、成长，就有机会「逆天改命」。

When asked about his biggest changes in recent years, Lei Jun stated it was the improvement and change in "cognition". "In the past few years, Xiaomi has undergone tremendous changes, essentially because our cognition has changed," and he plans to delve deeper into this topic in his annual speech. 在被问及近几年自身最大的变化时，雷军表示是「认知」的提升和改变，「过去几年小米发生了翻天覆地的变化，本质就是我们的认知发生了变化」，并计划在年度演讲中与大家深入探讨这一话题。

item.title: 美宜佳首款鸿蒙「碰一下」智慧收银机亮相
item.guid: 美宜佳首款鸿蒙「碰一下」智慧收银机亮相
item.description:
Alipay Open Platform announced yesterday that Meiyijia recently signed a joint innovation cooperation agreement with Huawei Cloud and Alipay in Shanghai. The three parties will integrate their advantageous resources to jointly create benchmark smart retail solutions. 支付宝开放平台昨日宣布，美宜佳近日与华为云、支付宝在上海签署联创合作协议，三方将整合优势资源，共同打造智慧零售标杆解决方案。

As an important outcome of the cooperation, Meiyijia has taken the lead in launching the first HarmonyOS smart cash register equipped with "Tap to Interact" technology, and plans to gradually deploy it in multiple stores nationwide. 作为合作的重要成果，美宜佳率先推出首台搭载「碰一下」交互技术的鸿蒙智慧收银机，并计划陆续在全国多家门店投入使用。

According to the agreement, Meiyijia will leverage its network of over 40,000 stores nationwide, combined with Huawei's HarmonyOS system and ecosystem technical support, and Alipay's mature capabilities in digital operations and payment – including innovative interactive technologies like "Tap to Interact" – to advance the construction of a store-wide intelligent operation system, achieving a dual improvement in consumer experience and store efficiency. 根据协议，美宜佳将依托全国超 40000 家门店网络，结合华为鸿蒙系统及生态技术支持，以及支付宝在数字经营与支付领域的成熟能力 —— 包括「碰一下」等创新交互技术，推进全店智能运营体系建设，实现消费者体验与门店效率的双提升。

"Tap to Interact" is an innovative interaction method launched by Alipay in 2024. Users can complete payments or access services by simply tapping a device or sticker after unlocking their phone, without needing to open the App. 「碰一下」是支付宝于 2024 年推出的创新交互方式，用户无需打开 App，解锁手机后轻触设备或贴纸即可完成支付或获取服务。

The three parties stated that in the future, they will incrementally promote smart device upgrades, account system interoperability, and member operation optimization, and explore intelligent innovations in multiple scenarios such as payment and advertising, creating scalable smart store models to accelerate industry digitalization. 三方表示，未来将分阶段推动智能设备升级、账号体系互通与会员运营优化，并探索支付、广告等多场景的智能化创新，打造可规模化复制的智慧门店样板，推动行业数字化加速。

item.title: 芬兰智能戒指厂商 Oura 将融资近 9 亿美元
item.guid: 芬兰智能戒指厂商-Oura-将融资近-9-亿美元
item.description:
According to Bloomberg, Finnish health technology company Oura Health Oy is currently undergoing a new round of financing, expected to raise approximately $875 million, with a post-money valuation of about $10.9 billion. 据彭博社报道，芬兰健康科技公司 Oura Health Oy 近日正在进行新一轮融资，预计将筹集约 8.75 亿美元，投后估值约为 109 亿美元。

According to informed sources, this round of financing is Series E, with a valuation almost double the $5 billion Series D round in November last year, and the final financing amount may exceed $900 million. 据知情人士透露，本轮融资为 E 轮，估值较去年 11 月 D 轮的 50 亿美元几乎翻倍，最终融资额或超过 9 亿美元。

Oura plans to use the funds to expand production capacity, increase R&D investment, and accelerate its international market presence. Oura 计划将资金用于扩大产能、加大研发投入并加速国际市场布局。

Since the beginning of this year, the company has launched the latest Oura Ring 4 in Japan and Germany, and plans to further expand its global sales network. 今年以来，该公司已在日本和德国推出最新款 Oura Ring 4，并计划进一步拓展全球销售网络。

Company CEO Tom Hale stated in an interview that Oura's business growth is "as fast as a rocket" and called it "the strongest quarter" in his 130-quarter business career. 公司 CEO Tom Hale 在接受采访时表示，Oura 业务增长「如同火箭般迅速」，并称这是其 130 个季度商业生涯中「最强劲的一个季度」。

He expects revenue to exceed $1 billion in 2025, doubling from $500 million in 2024, and is projected to surpass $1.5 billion in 2026. 他预计 2025 年营收将超过 10 亿美元，较 2024 年的 5 亿美元翻倍，2026 年有望突破 15 亿美元。

In addition to fundraising, Oura also signed a $250 million revolving credit agreement with several banks, including Bank of America, Wells Fargo, JPMorgan Chase, Goldman Sachs, Citi, and Barclays. 除融资外，Oura 还与包括美国银行、富国银行、摩根大通、高盛、花旗和巴克莱在内的多家银行签署了 2.5 亿美元循环信贷协议。

In the smart ring market, Oura remains the leader, but competition is gradually intensifying. 在智能戒指市场，Oura 仍是领先者，但竞争正逐步加剧。

Samsung's launch of the Galaxy Ring last year received a lukewarm response, and startups like Amazfit, Velia, and Ultrahuman have also entered the market. 三星去年推出 Galaxy Ring 反响平平，Amazfit、Velia、Ultrahuman 等初创公司也已入局。

Hale stated that rings will continue to be the company's core product form, citing their advantages in "wearing comfort, fashion, and accuracy." Hale 表示，戒指将继续作为公司核心产品形态，并称其在「佩戴舒适度、时尚性与精确度」方面具备优势。

item.title: 货拉拉回应被约谈
item.guid: 货拉拉回应被约谈
item.description:
Yesterday, the State Administration for Market Regulation (SAMR) held talks with Huolala, demanding that it strictly abide by laws and regulations such as the "Anti-Mononopoly Law of the People's Republic of China," implement its main responsibility for anti-monopoly compliance, promptly regulate its business practices, participate fairly in market competition, and safeguard the legitimate rights and interests of relevant parties such as truck drivers and consumers. 昨天，市场监管总局约谈货拉拉，要求其严格遵守《中华人民共和国反垄断法》等法律规定，落实反垄断合规主体责任，及时规范经营行为，公平参与市场竞争，维护货车司机、消费者等相关主体合法权益。

Regulatory authorities pointed out that platforms need to promote fair, just, open, and transparent rules and algorithms to ensure the healthy and orderly development of the industry. 监管部门指出，平台需推动规则与算法公平、公正、公开、透明，确保行业健康有序发展。

That evening, Huolala responded to the matter, stating that it would fully accept and implement the requirements of the talks, immediately initiate rectification, improve its anti-monopoly compliance management level, operate in accordance with laws and regulations, and participate fairly in market competition. 当天晚间，货拉拉对此事进行了回复，表示将全面接受并落实约谈要求，立即启动整改，提升反垄断合规管理水平，依法合规经营，公平参与市场竞争。

item.title: 广汽法务部：坚决追究造谣者法律责任
item.guid: 广汽法务部：坚决追究造谣者法律责任
item.description:
Multiple departments recently jointly issued the "Notice on Carrying out Special Rectification Actions for Online Chaos in the Automobile Industry," deciding to launch a three-month special rectification action nationwide. 多部门近日联合发布《关于开展汽车行业网络乱象专项整治行动的通知》，决定在全国范围内开展为期 3 个月的专项整治行动。

GAC Group's legal department posted on Weibo yesterday, stating that some unverified information has been circulating online recently, affecting the brand's image and disrupting normal online order. GAC Group has secured relevant evidence and will report the case to public security organs in accordance with the law, depending on the circumstances, and "resolutely pursue legal responsibility for rumor-mongers" to safeguard its legitimate rights and interests. 广汽集团法务部昨天在微博发文表示，近期网络上有部分未经证实的信息传播，影响品牌形象并扰乱正常网络秩序，广汽集团已固定相关证据，将视情节依法向公安机关报案，并「坚决追究造谣者的法律责任」，以维护合法权益。

item.title: 罗永浩：将评测预制菜
item.guid: 罗永浩：将评测预制菜
item.description:
Luo Yonghao posted on social media that he has returned to Shanghai, expressing "I love Shanghai," and at the same time responded to external speculation about "fleeing," stating that this trip was just a normal business trip. 罗永浩在社交平台发文称已回到上海，并表示「我爱上海」，同时回应外界「跑路」猜测，称此次只是正常出差。

On the same day, he shared photos of his meal at a restaurant, once again discussing the topic of pre-made dishes, stating that chain restaurants in shopping malls can also offer freshly stir-fried dishes, and announced that he would review most of the pre-made dishes available on the market. 当天，他晒出餐厅用餐照片，再次谈及预制菜话题，称商场连锁餐厅也可以有现炒菜，并表示将评测市面在售的大部分预制菜。

Previously, Luo Yonghao was sued by Xibei founder Jia Guolong for "damaging business reputation" after criticizing Xibei for using pre-made dishes without informing consumers and for inflated pricing. The dispute between the two parties attracted public attention. 此前，罗永浩因批评西贝使用预制菜未告知消费者且定价虚高，被西贝创始人贾国龙起诉「损害商誉」，双方争论引发舆论关注。

Some netizens discovered that his Weibo IP address had changed to "Hong Kong, China" and "Japan" in mid-September, sparking speculation about "fleeing for safety." Luo Yonghao reposted the relevant comments and replied, "I'm here, what are we betting on?" 有网友发现其微博 IP 属地曾在 9 月中旬变为「中国香港」和「日本」，引发「避险跑路」猜测。罗永浩转发相关言论并回复「我来，赌什么？」

item.title: 像素蛋糕宣布基础调色与手动工具永久免费
item.guid: 像素蛋糕宣布基础调色与手动工具永久免费
item.description:
Recently, "Pixel Cake," an AI photo editing software, officially announced that the basic color grading and manual tools of its Pixel series products will be permanently free, allowing users to use them without additional payment. 日前，AI 修图软件「像素蛋糕」官方宣布，旗下像素系列产品的基础调色功能与手动工具将改为永久免费开放，用户无需额外付费即可使用。

According to the introduction, this adjustment covers common functions such as basic color correction, brightness and contrast adjustment, while retaining the original set of manual photo editing tools. 据介绍，此次调整涵盖基础色彩校正、亮度与对比度调节等常用功能，同时保留原有的手动修图工具集。

The official statement indicates that this move aims to lower the barrier to entry for creators and enhance the overall creative experience. 官方表示，此举旨在降低创作者的使用门槛，并提升整体创作体验。

item.title: 💡 YouTube CEO：AI 是「下一次大爆炸」
item.guid: 💡-YouTube-CEO：AI-是「下一次大爆炸」
item.description:
According to Wired, YouTube announced its full embrace of AI technology on its 20th anniversary, launching multiple AI features for creators. 据 Wired 报道，YouTube 在成立 20 周年之际宣布全面拥抱人工智能技术，推出多项面向创作者的 AI 功能。

Officials stated that these tools will help users generate video content through prompts and automatically create matching visuals for podcast audio. 官方表示，这些工具将帮助用户通过提示词生成视频内容，并可自动为播客音频生成匹配的视觉画面。

YouTube CEO Neal Mohan reflected on the platform's growth journey in an interview, emphasizing that AI is the latest technological means to continue its core mission of "giving more people a voice." YouTube CEO Neal Mohan 在接受采访时回顾了平台的成长历程，并强调 AI 是延续「让更多人发声」这一核心使命的最新技术手段。

When YouTube was born, technology allowed more people to be heard; today, AI follows the same principle – using technology to make creation more inclusive.

It is reported that some new features are based on Google DeepMind's Veo 3 technology, supporting the instant generation of complex scene videos, such as "100 Indonesian dancers on the moon." 据悉，部分新功能基于 Google DeepMind 的 Veo 3 技术，支持即时生成复杂场景视频，例如「在月球上的 100 位印尼舞者」。

The platform will label AI-generated content, but currently offers no filtering options. Mohan believes that the value of AI videos depends on the creator's originality and creativity, not the generation ratio. 平台将对 AI 生成内容进行标注，但目前没有提供过滤选项。Mohan 认为，AI 视频的价值取决于创作者的原创性和创意，而非生成比例。

item.title: OPPO Find X9 外观公布
item.guid: OPPO-Find-X9-外观公布
item.description:
Zhou Yibao, product manager for the OPPO Find series, officially unveiled the complete appearance and core design highlights of the Find X9 series on Weibo yesterday. OPPO Find 系列产品负责人周意保昨天在微博正式公布了 Find X9 系列的完整外观与核心设计亮点。

Zhou Yibao stated that the device is positioned as a top-tier flagship, focusing on texture upgrades and detail optimization: 周意保表示，该机定位顶级旗舰，重点在于质感升级与细节优化：

  • New "Velvet Sand Process": Utilizes micron-level precision control to give the glass a sophisticated, understated velvet-like metallic luster and a delicate, skin-friendly touch; 全新「绒砂工艺」：采用微米级精度控制，让玻璃呈现高级内敛的绒感金属光泽，并带来细腻亲肤的触感；
  • Cold Carving Process eliminates seams: The camera module and back panel achieve seamless integration through ultra-precision cold carving, resulting in a more natural overall look; 冷雕工艺消除拼接感：镜头模组与背板通过超精密冷雕工艺实现无缝衔接，整体观感更自然；
  • Golden Grip Size Flat Screen: Continues the 6.59-inch and 6.78-inch flat screen design, and adopts an ultra-large curved frame to enhance grip comfort; 黄金握持尺寸直屏：延续 6.59 英寸与 6.78 英寸直屏设计，并采用超大弧度边框，提升握持舒适度；
  • Ultra-narrow Four Equal Bezels + Full-scene 1nit Eye-Care Screen: Physical four equal bezels are further narrowed, paired with a new generation eye-care screen for a more immersive visual experience; 极窄四等边 + 全场景 1nit 明眸护眼屏：物理四等边黑边进一步收窄，搭配新一代护眼屏，视觉效果更沉浸；
  • Thin and Light Body balancing imaging and battery life: All models feature a Hasselblad quad-camera system, with a square lens module that controls protrusion while increasing light intake. 轻薄机身兼顾影像与续航：全系搭载哈苏四摄影像系统，方形镜组在控制凸起的同时提升进光量。

Regarding battery capacity, the standard version is 7025mAh, and the Pro version reaches 7500mAh, both maintaining balanced weight distribution. 电池容量方面，标准版为 7025mAh，Pro 版达 7500mAh，并保持均衡配重。

In terms of color options, Find X9 offers "Velvet Titanium," "Frost White," and "Mist Black," while Find X9 Pro offers "Velvet Sand Titanium" and "Frost White," with one special color yet to be announced. 配色方面，Find X9 提供「绒光钛」「霜白」「雾黑」，Find X9 Pro 提供「绒砂钛」「霜白」，另有一款特别配色尚未公布。

Officials previously announced that the series will be officially released on October 16. 官方此前公布，该系列将于 10 月 16 日正式发布。

item.title: 卢伟冰：小米17 Pro Max 有「2K级」的显示效果
item.guid: 卢伟冰：小米17-Pro-Max-有「2K级」的显示效果
item.description:
Lu Weibing, President of Xiaomi Group, revealed on social media yesterday that the Xiaomi 17 Pro Max will be the first to adopt "Super Pixel Arrangement" technology. 小米集团总裁卢伟冰昨天在社交平台透露，小米 17 Pro Max 首次采用「超级像素排列」技术。

He explained that this solution equips each pixel with independent red, green, and blue sub-pixels, eliminating the need to borrow from adjacent sub-pixels, unlike traditional OLEDs. Although the screen resolution numerically does not reach 2K, the total number of sub-pixels is as high as 9.38 million, equivalent to 2K level . 他介绍道，该方案为每颗像素配备独立的红、绿、蓝三色子像素，相比传统 OLED 无需借用相邻子像素。虽然屏幕分辨率在数值上未达到 2K，但子像素总量高达 938 万， 与 2K 水准相当 。

Lu Weibing pointed out that there had been considerable internal debate over this solution. 2K screens have been on the market for ten years and are synonymous with ultra-clear displays, so abandoning 2K numerically would mean a "step backward." 卢伟冰指出，内部曾对这一方案存在较大争议。2K 屏幕已在市场存在十年，是超清显示的代名词，放弃 2K 在数值上意味着「回退」。

Additionally, yesterday afternoon, Xiaomi officially released a promotional poster for the Xiaomi 17 series on Weibo, stating that the Xiaomi 17 series is fully compatible with the 100W PPS universal charging protocol. 此外，昨天下午，小米官方还在微博发布小米 17 系列宣传海报，称小米 17 系列全面兼容 100W PPS 通用充电协议。

According to previous reports, the Xiaomi 17 series will be the first globally to feature the fifth-generation Snapdragon 8 Extreme Edition mobile platform. The Xiaomi 17 Pro and Pro Max will be equipped with a 50-megapixel Leica ultra-large sensor triple rear camera and a new back screen design. 据此前报道，小米 17 系列将全球首发第五代骁龙 8 至尊版移动平台，小米 17 Pro 和 Pro Max 将配备 5000 万像素徕卡超大底后置三摄和全新背屏设计。

item.title: 尚界 H5 与全新问界 M7 同台亮相
item.guid: 尚界-H5-与全新问界-M7-同台亮相
item.description:
On the evening of September 23, Huawei launched two new smart car products at its autumn new product launch event – the Shangjie H5 and the new AITO M7 – further enriching the HarmonyOS Smart Travel product matrix, covering market segments from over 100,000 yuan to over 300,000 yuan. 9 月 23 日晚，华为在秋季新品发布会上推出两款智能汽车新品 —— 尚界 H5 与全新问界 M7，进一步丰富鸿蒙智行产品矩阵，覆盖从十几万元到三十万元以上的市场区间。

According to reports, the Shangjie H5 is the first model of the "Shangjie" brand, co-created by Huawei and SAIC Group, with a starting price of 159,800 yuan , targeting the smart car market under 200,000 yuan. 据介绍，尚界 H5 是华为与上汽集团合作打造的「尚界」品牌首款车型， 起售价 15.98 万元 ，定位 20 万元以下智能汽车市场。

The new AITO M7 has been comprehensively upgraded in terms of appearance, cockpit, performance, and safety, offering two power versions: extended-range and pure electric, with starting prices of 279,800 yuan and 319,800 yuan respectively. 全新问界 M7 则在外观、座舱、性能与安全方面全面升级，提供增程与纯电两种动力版本，售价分别为 27.98 万元起 与 31.98 万元起。

Shangjie H5 Key Features: 尚界 H5 主要配置：

    Equipped with Qiankun Smart Driving ADS 4 system, all models come standard with 3 4D millimeter-wave radars and 192-line LiDAR.

    HarmonyOS Cockpit, supports driver welcome, 3D facial recognition, electronic pets, and ultra-smooth navigation.

    Supports watch control and StarFlash car key.

    Mic-less K-song 2.0, HUAWEI MagLink in-car screen, native drawing function.

    First introduction of parking space to parking space navigation assistance function.

    601L trunk, second-row seats can be folded down to form a "large bed mode".

    Pure electric version with a maximum range of 655 km, extended-range version with a comprehensive range of 1360 km.

New AITO M7 Key Features: 全新问界 M7 主要配置：

    Equipped with Qiankun Smart Driving ADS 4, Turing Platform, and Whale Battery Platform.

    Omni-directional anti-collision system 4.0, LiDAR solution.

    Driver's zero-gravity seat can automatically adjust in conjunction with the steering wheel.

    Front passenger's quasi-zero-gravity seat supports 70° leg rest, backrest adjustment, massage, ventilation, and heating.

    Star-ring dual-wing headlights, integrated star-wing taillights.

    16.1-inch 3K floating screen + 17.3-inch rear entertainment screen.

    All vehicle screens support three-finger swipe multi-screen flow.

    The extended-range version has a maximum comprehensive range of 1600+ km, and the pure electric version has a maximum range of 700+ km.

At the press conference, Huawei also announced the latest delivery data for other HarmonyOS Smart Travel models, emphasizing that "safety is the greatest luxury" and considering safety features as standard across all series. 发布会上，华为方面还公布了鸿蒙智行其他车型的最新交付数据，并强调「安全是最大的豪华」，将安全能力视为全系标配。

item.title: 1998 元起，大疆发布 Osmo Nano 自由视角穿戴相机
item.guid: 1998-元起，大疆发布-Osmo-Nano-自由视角穿戴相机
item.description:
DJI officially launched the new Osmo Nano free-angle wearable camera yesterday, positioned as a lightweight, portable shooting device for sports recording, travel vlogs, and daily life scenarios. 大疆于昨天正式推出新款 Osmo Nano 自由视角穿戴相机，定位轻量化便携拍摄设备，面向运动记录、旅行 vlog 及日常生活场景。

It is reported that the product features a wearable design, supports multi-angle shooting, and has been optimized in terms of body size and weight to enhance comfort during long periods of wear. 据悉，该产品采用可穿戴设计，支持多角度拍摄，并在机身尺寸与重量上进行了优化，以提升长时间佩戴的舒适度。

Key hardware and feature highlights: 主要硬件与功能亮点：

    Body weight approximately 80 grams, supports long-term wear

    Equipped with a 1/1.3-inch CMOS sensor, supports 4K 60fps video recording

    Built-in three-axis stabilization system, enhancing dynamic shooting stability

    Supports Bluetooth and Wi-Fi connectivity, allowing real-time screen synchronization with mobile apps

    Battery life approximately 120 minutes, supports fast charging

    IPX4 waterproof rating, capable of handling daily splash resistance

The Osmo Nano is now available on shopping platforms, with the 64GB standard kit starting from 1998 yuan. Osmo Nano 目前已上架购物平台，64GB 标准套装 1998 元起。

item.title: 支持 8K 拍摄，GoPro MAX 2 全景运动相机发布
item.guid: 支持-8K-拍摄，GoPro-MAX-2-全景运动相机发布
item.description:
Action camera brand GoPro officially launched its latest flagship product, MAX 2, today, featuring native 8K panoramic shooting capabilities. 运动相机品牌 GoPro 今日正式推出最新旗舰产品 MAX 2，主打原生 8K 全景拍摄能力。

Through its dual-lens 360° panoramic mode, MAX 2 can deliver up to 35-megapixel image quality, providing "true" 8K resolution 360° video. According to official introduction, the effective resolution is increased by approximately 21% compared to similar products. 通过双镜头 360° 全景模式，MAX 2 可呈现高达 3500 万像素画质，带来「真正的」8K 分辨率 360° 视频，据官方介绍，有效分辨率较同类产品提升约 21%。

MAX 2's hardware configuration has significantly improved compared to its predecessor, mainly including: MAX 2 的硬件配置较前代有显著提升，主要包括：

    Native 8K resolution 360° panoramic video recording, with image quality up to 35 megapixels, supporting 5.6K60 and 8K30 high-quality, high-frame-rate shooting modes and 3x slow-motion shooting (4K 100fps)

    10-Bit color depth and GP-Log mode, with a maximum bitrate of 300Mbps

    29-megapixel 360° photo shooting, supporting free composition in post-production

    Dual lenses support 4K 60fps 180° ultra-wide-angle video, with a field of view exceeding the traditional 170°

    Replaceable lens design

    Upgraded 6-microphone array, supporting 360° stereo sound and wind noise reduction

    1960mAh battery

    Features such as 5-meter waterproofing, horizon lock stabilization, and AI intelligent tracking

Regarding accessories, the official release also includes a 1-meter carbon fiber pole, an 80cm floating extension pole, a locking 1/4-20 mounting buckle, a carbon fiber extension set, and a MAX2 USB transfer port, among others. 配件方面，官方同步推出 1 米碳纤维杆、80cm 漂浮式延长杆、带锁 1/4-20 安装卡扣、碳纤维延长套装及 MAX2 USB 传输转口等。

The GoPro MAX 2 is now available for sale on the overseas official website, priced at $499.99 (approximately RMB 3557). The price and launch date for the domestic version have not yet been announced. GoPro MAX 2 已在海外官网开售，售价为 499.99 美元（约合人民币 3557 元），国行版售价与上市时间暂未公布。

iFanr also launched a comparative review of the two new action cameras immediately. Click the link below to learn more. 爱范儿也在第一时间推出了两款运动相机新品的对比体验，可点击下方链接了解更多。

item.title: iQOO 15 举办电竞性能技术沟通会
item.guid: iQOO-15-举办电竞性能技术沟通会
item.description:
Before the official release of iQOO 15, iQOO held a technical communication conference focused on e-sports performance, revealing several core hardware and feature details. 在 iQOO 15 正式发布前，iQOO 举办了一场以电竞性能为主题的技术沟通会，公布了多项核心硬件与功能细节。

The official statement indicates that the new device has undergone targeted optimizations in screen, image processing, and game engine aspects, aiming to meet the demands of high-intensity mobile e-sports. 官方表示，新机在屏幕、图像处理以及游戏引擎方面进行了针对性优化，旨在满足高强度移动电竞的需求。

Key hardware and feature parameters are as follows: 主要硬件与功能参数如下：

    Features a 6.85-inch 2K flat screen, globally debuting "M14 luminous material," supporting hardware-level game eye protection and 8T LTPO technology

    Built-in self-developed e-sports chip "Q3," providing "graphics card-level" game visual effects processing capabilities

    Equipped with "Monster Super Core Engine," including "Prophet Scheduler" and "Lightning Accelerator"

    The first batch of models includes iQOO 15 and iQOO Neo 11

    Equipped with periscope telephoto, wireless charging, and a new linear motor

The content of this communication conference shows that manufacturers have made new attempts in screen materials, image processing chips, and game engines, aiming to provide mobile e-sports users with a visual and operational experience closer to that of PCs. 此次沟通会的内容显示，厂商在屏幕材料、图像处理芯片以及游戏引擎方面均有新尝试，意在为移动电竞用户提供更接近 PC 端的视觉与操作体验。

item.title: 阿里云发布首个端到端全模态 AI 模型
item.guid: 阿里云发布首个端到端全模态-AI-模型
item.description:
Yesterday, Alibaba Cloud officially released and open-sourced the brand new Qwen3-Omni, Qwen3-TTS, and Qwen-Image-Edit-2509, which benchmarks against Google's Nano Banana image editing tool. 昨天，阿里云正式发布并开源全新的 Qwen3-Omni、Qwen3-TTS，以及对标谷歌 Nano Banana 图像编辑工具的 Qwen-Image-Edit-2509。

According to reports, Qwen3-Omni is the industry's first native end-to-end full-modal AI model, supporting multi-type inputs such as text, images, audio, and video, and can output results in real-time streaming via text and natural speech, solving the long-standing challenge of trade-offs between different capabilities in multimodal models. 据介绍，Qwen3-Omni 是业界首个原生端到端全模态 AI 模型，支持文本、图像、音频和视频多类型输入，并可通过文本与自然语音实时流式输出结果，解决了多模态模型在不同能力间权衡取舍的长期难题。

Key features include: 核心特性包括：

    Cross-modal Advanced Performance: Achieved state-of-the-art in 22 out of 36 audio/video benchmarks, leading in 32 within the open-source domain; comparable to Gemini 2.5 Pro in automatic speech recognition, audio comprehension, and voice conversation.

    Multilingual Support: Covers 119 text languages, 19 speech input languages, and 10 speech output languages.

    Innovative Architecture: Based on MoE "Mixture of Experts" "Thinker-Expresser" design, combining AuT pre-training with a multi-codebook scheme to reduce latency.

    Real-time Interaction: Low-latency streaming audio/video interaction, supporting natural turn-taking conversations and instant responses.

    Detailed Audio Description: Qwen3-Omni-30B-A3B-Captioner has been open-sourced, filling a gap in the open-source community for general-purpose audio description.

The simultaneously unveiled Qwen3-TTS supports 17 voice options, with each voice supporting 10 languages, covering various Chinese dialects such as Minnan, Wu, Cantonese, and Sichuanese. 同时亮相的 Qwen3-TTS 支持 17 种音色选择，每种音色均支持 10 种语言，并覆盖闽南语、吴语、粤语、四川话等多种中国方言。

Qwen3-TTS-Flash surpasses SeedTTS, MiniMax, GPT-4o-Audio-Preview, and Elevenlabs in terms of speech stability and timbre similarity. Qwen3-TTS-Flash 在语音稳定性与音色相似度方面超越 SeedTTS、MiniMax、GPT-4o-Audio-Preview、Elevenlabs。

Qwen-Image-Edit-2509 is the monthly iterative version of Qwen-Image, improving consistency in single and multi-image editing, supporting various types of editing such as portraits, products, and text, and natively supporting ControlNet. Qwen-Image-Edit-2509 则是 Qwen-Image 月度迭代版本，提升了单图与多图编辑一致性，支持人像、产品、文字等多类型编辑，并原生支持 ControlNet。

Additionally, Qwen3-Next-80B-A3B-Instruct-FP8 and Qwen3-Next-80B-A3B-Thinking-FP8 have also been open-sourced simultaneously. 此外，Qwen3-Next-80B-A3B-Instruct-FP8 与 Qwen3-Next-80B-A3B-Thinking-FP8 也已同步开源。

item.title: 特斯拉简化版 Model Y 被曝光，配置大幅精简
item.guid: 特斯拉简化版-Model-Y-被曝光，配置大幅精简
item.description:
Recently, a user named @greentheonly claimed on X that a simplified version of the Model Y, codenamed "E41," was discovered in Tesla's official firmware. This vehicle is believed to be the upcoming lower-priced Model Y. The overall strategy can be summarized in one sentence: "Everything that could be cut, was cut." 近日，一名叫 @greentheonly 的用户在 X 上称，在特斯拉官方固件中发现代号为「E41」的 Model Y 简化版本，该车被认为是即将推出的低价版 Model Y。整体策略可用一句话概括 ——「能砍的都砍了」。

According to the leak, the main reductions include: 据其爆料，主要减配内容包括：

    Roof: Panoramic glass sunroof canceled

    Suspension: Downgraded suspension system

    Seats: Multi-directional adjustment downgraded to single-axis adjustment

    Air Conditioning: Simplified air vents

    Rearview Mirrors: Electric folding function removed

    Camera: Rearview camera heating function canceled

    Interior Screen: Second-row display screen canceled

    Audio System: Downgraded to "Essential" basic version or "improved basic version"

    Interior: Headliner simplified to fiberglass, ambient lighting and welcome lights canceled

    Wheels: Reduced to 18-inch specification

    Other: Tire pressure monitoring system canceled

It is reported that the "E41" will offer both rear-wheel drive and all-wheel drive versions, both featuring special motor configurations, but specific parameters have not yet been announced. 据悉，「E41」将提供后驱与全驱两种版本，均采用特殊电机配置，但具体参数尚未公布。

Some netizens even believe that the cancellation of the panoramic sunroof is an "upgrade," as driving in summer will no longer expose their heads to direct sunlight. 部分网友甚至认为取消全景天窗是「升级」，因为夏季行车不再暴晒头顶。

🔗 Related reading: Various cost-cutting! Tesla's "Model Y Cheap Version" has been stripped bare 🔗 相关阅读： 各种减配！特斯拉的「Model Y 廉价版」被扒光了

item.title: 可口可乐或继续掌控 Costa 即饮业务
item.guid: 可口可乐或继续掌控-Costa-即饮业务
item.description:
Sky News UK cited sources saying that The Coca-Cola Company has made it clear to potential buyers that it will retain control over Costa coffee ready-to-drink products. This means that if a deal materializes, the scope of the sale might be limited to the store business. 英国天空新闻援引消息人士称，可口可乐公司已向潜在收购方明确表示，将保留对 Costa 咖啡即饮产品的控制权。这意味着，若交易成真，出售范围或仅限于门店业务。

The report stated that Apollo Global Management had considered bidding for Costa but decided not to participate before last week's bid deadline. Other bidders included TDR Capital, but the number of bids was lower than expected. 报道称，阿波罗全球管理公司曾考虑竞购 Costa，但在上周报价截止前决定不参与。其他竞标方包括 TDR Capital，不过投标数量低于预期。

It is understood that Coca-Cola will continue to control the Costa ready-to-drink series sold in supermarkets and grocery channels. 据悉，可口可乐在超市及杂货渠道销售的 Costa 即饮系列将继续由其掌控。

Data shows that Costa entered the Chinese ready-to-drink market in early 2020, rapidly covering supermarkets, convenience stores, and e-commerce channels by leveraging the distribution networks of COFCO Coca-Cola and Swire Coca-Cola. 资料显示，Costa 于 2020 年初进入中国即饮市场，依托中粮可口可乐与太古可口可乐的分销网络，迅速覆盖商超、便利店及电商渠道。

Over the past 5 years, the brand has entered the top three in China's ready-to-drink coffee market. Its pricing strategy is positioned between retail coffee brands like Master Kong and Nestlé, and Starbucks bottled coffee, with a price of approximately 2.33 yuan per 100 milliliters. 过去 5 年，该品牌已跻身中国即饮咖啡市场前三。其定价策略介于康师傅、雀巢等零售咖啡品牌与星巴克瓶装咖啡之间，每百毫升售价约 2.33 元。

Coca-Cola has not officially confirmed plans to sell Costa's store business, but executives previously emphasized that the core of all M&A transactions is to create overall value for the system, customers, and consumers. 可口可乐方面未正式确认出售 Costa 门店业务的计划，但高管此前强调，所有并购交易的核心是为体系、客户与消费者创造整体价值。

item.title: 盒马最难吃的甜品被台风「选出」
item.guid: 盒马最难吃的甜品被台风「选出」
item.description:
According to Southern Metropolis Daily, Typhoon "Huajia Sha" recently approached with force, prompting citizens in many parts of Guangdong to stock up in advance, with a significant increase in the replenishment frequency of vegetables, grains, and other food ingredients. 据南方都市报报道，近日，台风「桦加沙」来势汹汹，广东多地市民提前囤货应对，青菜、粮油等食材补货频率明显提升。

However, this wave of "typhoon-induced selective buying" also unexpectedly revealed local consumers' taste preferences — some desserts, instant noodles, fruits, and vegetables were overlooked during the panic buying, with a durian daifuku being particularly noticeable. 不过，这波「台风严选」也意外揭示了当地消费者的口味偏好 —— 部分甜品、方便面、水果、蔬菜在抢购潮中被冷落，其中一款榴莲大福尤为显眼。

Some netizens joked that "Guangdong people would rather starve than compromise their taste buds," and durian daifuku became the most left-over dessert. 有网友调侃「广东人宁可饿着也不向味蕾妥协」，而榴莲大福则成为被剩下最多的甜品。

In response, Hema's customer service stated that durian daifuku stock is sufficient and not due to unsold inventory, adding that they will adjust the product recipe based on consumer feedback to cater to more preferences. They also reminded Guangdong consumers to minimize going out and stay safe. 对此，盒马客服回应称，榴莲大福库存充足，非因滞销导致剩货，并表示后续将根据消费者反馈对商品配方进行调整，以满足更多人的喜好。同时提醒广东消费者尽量减少外出，注意安全。

item.title: 卖婴儿纸尿裤的尤妮佳在华转向宠物食品
item.guid: 卖婴儿纸尿裤的尤妮佳在华转向宠物食品
item.description:
According to a previous report by Nikkei, Unicharm, a Japanese daily necessities company, has officially put its first pet food factory in China into operation this year. 据日本经济新闻此前报道，日本日用品企业尤妮佳（Unicharm）在中国的首家宠物食品工厂已于今年正式投入运营。

The factory is located in Jiangsu Province and was built in cooperation between Unicharm and JIA PETS. Unicharm holds more than 40% of the shares, with a total investment exceeding 10 billion Japanese Yen (approximately 480 million RMB). 该工厂位于江苏省，由尤妮佳与吉家宠物（JIA PETS）合作建设，尤妮佳持股比例超过 40%，总投资额超过 100 亿日元（约人民币 4.8 亿元）。

Unicharm stated that this move aims to achieve stable supply and rapid sales through localized production, reduce costs, and plans to increase the proportion of pet-related products in its China business sales from the current 1% to 20% by 2030. 尤妮佳表示，此举旨在通过本土化生产实现稳定供给与快速销售，降低成本，并计划到 2030 年将宠物相关产品在中国业务销售额中的占比从目前的 1% 提升至 20%。

Public data shows that the first phase of JIA PETS' pet food project, built in the Xinyi Economic Development Zone, Xuzhou, Jiangsu, has been fully put into operation, with an annual production capacity of 200,000 tons and an estimated annual output value exceeding 4 billion RMB. 公开资料显示，吉家宠物在江苏徐州新沂经济开发区建设的宠物食品项目一期已全面投产，年产能可达 20 万吨，预计年产值超 40 亿元。

Industry data shows that China is the world's second-largest pet consumption market. In 2024, the number of dogs and cats is expected to reach 187 million, and the pet food market size has exceeded 300 billion RMB, maintaining stable growth. 业内数据显示，中国是全球第二大宠物消费市场，2024 年犬猫数量预计达 1.87 亿只，宠物食品市场规模突破 3000 亿元，且保持稳定增长。

Unicharm believes that as the proportion of young people owning pets increases, localized production will accelerate new product research and development and launch, and pet supplies are expected to become an important source of revenue after sanitary napkins and diapers. 尤妮佳认为，随着年轻群体养宠比例提升，本土化生产将加速新品研发与上市，宠物用品有望成为继卫生巾和纸尿裤之后的重要营收来源。

item.title: 抹茶秋季热度再攀高，茶饮品牌集中上新「浓郁系」新品
item.guid: 抹茶秋季热度再攀高，茶饮品牌集中上新「浓郁系」新品
item.description:
FoodTalks recently published an article stating that this autumn, the popularity of matcha in the beverage market continues to rise. FoodTalks 近日发布文章称，今年秋季，抹茶在饮品市场的热度持续升温。

Since September, several leading brands, including Goodme, Naixue, Cha Bai Dao, and Húshàng Āyí, have intensively launched new matcha products, with flavors shifting from the refreshing style of spring to "richer" combinations more suitable for autumn and winter. 自 9 月以来，古茗、奈雪、茶百道、沪上阿姨等多家头部品牌密集推出抹茶新品，口味从春季的清爽风格转向更适合秋冬的「浓郁系」搭配。

On September 3rd, Húshàng Āyí launched "Qianmu Matcha Cheese Rice Mochi" and "Qianmu Matcha Coconut Daifuku," combining matcha with ingredients like rice mochi, cheese milk foam, and raw coconut milk to create a rich layered taste. 9 月 3 日，沪上阿姨推出「千目抹茶芝芝米麻薯」与「千目抹茶生椰大福」，将抹茶与米麻薯、芝士奶盖、生椰乳等食材结合，带来层次丰富的口感。

On September 5th, Naixue launched "Rich Matcha Cream Cheese Rice Pudding Fresh Milk Tea," using cream cheese to neutralize the slight bitterness of matcha, receiving many positive reviews from consumers. 9 月 5 日，奈雪上新「浓抹干酪米布布鲜奶茶」，以干酪中和抹茶微苦，获得不少消费者好评。

Goodme launched "Coconut Matcha Mochi" and "Matcha Happy Coconut" on September 11th, and further added "Double Cheese Matcha" on the 19th. 古茗则在 9 月 11 日推出「生椰抹茶麻薯」「抹茶开心椰」，并于 19 日加码「双重芝士抹茶」。

Cha Bai Dao launched "Qianmu Salty Farao" on September 16th, combining ultra-fine Qianmu Jingshan matcha with savory Farao, quickly gaining popularity on social media platforms. 茶百道在 9 月 16 日推出「千目咸法酪」，以超千目径山抹茶搭配咸香法酪，迅速在社交平台走红。

The article points out that this round of matcha craze shows three major changes: 文章指出，本轮抹茶热潮呈现三大变化：

    Richer pairings – ingredients like rice mochi, cream cheese, and cheese have become common combinations for new matcha products, satisfying consumers' demand for warm, full-bodied flavors in autumn and winter.

    Emphasizing "Qianmu" quality – several brands highlight the "Qianmu grinding" concept in their new product naming and promotion, reinforcing matcha's fine powder texture and high-end positioning.

    More diverse applications – matcha is no longer limited to beverage bases but is also widely used in milk foam, toppings, and fruit pairings, demonstrating extremely high flavor compatibility.

Industry analysis suggests that the compatibility of matcha with rich ingredients like milk and cheese has allowed it to break through the perception of being "spring/summer exclusive," revealing huge potential in the autumn and winter markets. In the future, aroma innovation and visual breakthroughs may become key directions for matcha products to continuously attract consumers. 业内分析认为，抹茶与牛乳、芝士等浓郁食材的适配性，使其突破了「春夏限定」的认知边界，秋冬市场潜力巨大。未来，香气创新与视觉突破或将成为抹茶产品持续吸引消费者的关键方向。

item.title: 《毕正明的证明》预售开启
item.guid: 《毕正明的证明》预售开启
item.description:
The action/drama film "Bi Zhengming's Proof" officially opened national pre-sales yesterday and simultaneously released the "Please Take Care of Your Valuables" version trailer. 动作 / 剧情片《毕正明的证明》于昨日正式开启全国预售，并同步发布「请看管好随身财物」版预告。

The film is directed by Tong Zhijian, starring Wang Anyu, Zhang Tian'ai, and Wang Yanlin, with Nie Yuan in a special appearance, and Feng Bing, Wu Jiakai, and Kong Lingmei in leading roles. It will be released nationwide on October 1st. 影片由佟志坚执导，王安宇、张天爱、王彦霖领衔主演，聂远特别出演，冯兵、邬家楷、孔令美主演，将于 10 月 1 日登陆全国院线。

The film tells the story of Bi Zhengming, who aspired to be a police officer since childhood but was accidentally disabled on his first day of reporting, becoming a "one-day police officer." 影片故事讲述毕正明从小立志当警察，却在报到首日意外致残，沦为「一日警察」。

To prove himself, he infiltrates the "Rongmen" thief gang alone, upholding his original intention amidst lurking dangers. The numerous train scenes in the film not only resonate with holiday travel life but also reflect the changes of the times: from rampant thieves on green-skinned trains to the orderly high-speed rail era, "safety" has become a keyword universally felt. 为证明自己，他孤身潜入盗贼团伙「荣门」，在危机四伏中坚持初心。片中大量火车场景不仅贴近节日出行生活，也折射时代变迁：从绿皮火车盗贼猖獗到高铁时代秩序井然，「安全」成为全民共感的关键词。

item.title: 死亡搁浅系列首部动画电影项目《MOSQUITO》正式公布
item.guid: 死亡搁浅系列首部动画电影项目《MOSQUITO》正式公布
item.description:
Kojima Productions announced the launch of a new animated film project, "MOSQUITO (tentative title)," as an extension of the "Death Stranding" game series, and simultaneously released a teaser video. 小岛工作室宣布，作为游戏《死亡搁浅》系列的延伸，将启动全新动画电影项目《MOSQUITO（暂定名）》，并同步公开先导影像。

The film will be co-produced with Hollywood, directed by Hiroshi Miyamoto of ABC ANIMATION Co., Ltd., with Aaron Guzikowski serving as screenwriter. 该片将与好莱坞联合制作，由株式会社 ABC ANIMATION 导演宫本浩史执导，Aaron Guzikowski 担任编剧。

It is reported that "MOSQUITO" marks Kojima Productions' first venture into feature-length animated film production, with the animation handled independently by ABC ANIMATION, also marking the company's first full involvement in a major animated film project. 据悉，《MOSQUITO》是小岛工作室首次尝试长篇动画电影制作，动画部分由 ABC ANIMATION 独立负责，这也是该公司首次完全参与大型动画电影项目。

Hiroshi Miyamoto previously directed works such as "Hugtto! Precure♡Precure All Stars Memories," and screenwriter Aaron Guzikowski's notable works include "Raised by Wolves" and "Prisoners." 宫本浩史曾执导《拥抱！光之美少女♡光之美少女 All Stars Memories》等作品，编剧 Aaron Guzikowski 代表作包括《异星灾变》与，《红番血路》。

The official release date and further plot details have not yet been announced, but judging from the teaser video, the film continues the unique worldview and visual style of the "Death Stranding" series, and is expected to bring fans a brand new narrative experience. 官方尚未公布上映日期及更多剧情细节，但从先导影像来看，影片延续了《死亡搁浅》系列的独特世界观与视觉风格，预计将为粉丝带来全新的叙事体验。

item.title: 《浪浪人生》开启预售
item.guid: 《浪浪人生》开启预售
item.description:
The movie "The Stray Life" today released its "Whole Family Onboard" trailer and "This Family Is Not To Be Trifled With" poster, announcing that national pre-sales have officially begun. 电影《浪浪人生》今日发布「全家一起上」版预告及「这一家子不好惹」版海报，并宣布全国预售正式开启。

The film is adapted from Cai Chongda's bestseller "The Skin," produced by Han Han, directed by Ma Lin, written by Zhou Yunhai, starring Huang Bo, Fan Chengcheng, and Yin Tao, and will be released on September 30. 影片改编自蔡崇达畅销书《皮囊》，由韩寒监制，马林执导，周运海编剧，黄渤、范丞丞、殷桃领衔主演，将于 9 月 30 日上映。

According to the filmmakers, "The Stray Life" not only features "crazy" comedic elements but also conveys the warm emotions of mutual care and support among family members, making it suitable for audiences to watch with family and friends during the National Day holiday. Pre-sales for the film are now open. 据片方介绍，《浪浪人生》不仅有「疯」力十足的喜剧元素，还传递出家人之间彼此关心与托举的温暖情感，适合观众在国庆假期与亲友一同观影。影片预售现已开启。

item.title: 小岛恐怖游戏新作《OD – KNOCK》发布先导预告片
item.guid: 小岛恐怖游戏新作《OD-–-KNOCK》发布先导预告片
item.description:
At today's Kojima Productions 10th-anniversary event, "Beyond The Strand," renowned game producer Hideo Kojima officially released the latest teaser trailer "KNOCK" for "OD," a new horror game developed in collaboration with Xbox Game Studios. 在今日举行的小岛工作室成立 10 周年纪念活动「Beyond The Strand（超越羈絆）」上，知名游戏制作人小岛秀夫正式发布与 Xbox Game Studios 合作开发的恐怖新作《OD》最新前导预告片「KNOCK」。

"OD" first debuted at The Game Awards in late 2023, built with the latest Unreal Engine, and features actors Sophia Lillis ("It"), Hunter Schafer ("Euphoria"), and Udo Kier (who played "Yuri" in "Red Alert 2"). 《OD》最早于 2023 年底的 The Game Awards 首次亮相，采用最新虚幻引擎打造，并邀请《牠》演员苏菲亚·莉莉丝（Sophia Lillis）、《高校十八禁》演员杭特·薛佛（Hunter Schafer）以及曾饰演《红色警戒 2》角色「尤里」的乌多·基尔（Udo Kier）参演。

Unlike the first teaser, which only showcased 3D CG facial performances, this video fully presents highly realistic indoor scenes driven by the game engine, along with the vivid performance of the main character played by Sophia Lillis, creating a breathtakingly terrifying atmosphere. 与此前仅展示 3D CG 面部演出的首支预告不同，本次影片完整呈现了由游戏引擎驱动的高度写实室内场景，以及苏菲亚·莉莉丝饰演的主要角色的生动表演，营造出令人屏息的恐怖氛围。

Currently, the official release date for "OD" has not yet been announced. 目前，官方尚未公布《OD》的具体上市时间。
